taskbody.prereq: Available in the Enterprise edition only.
taskbody.context: The steps for configuring a connection to a server are the following:

step.cmd: In the Connections panel click the New button.
Enter a unique name for the connection.
Select one of the previously configured data sources in the Data Source combo box.

ul.li: URL - The URL to the server: http://<hostname>:<port>
User - The user name to access the repository.
Password - The password to access the repository.
Repository - The name of the repository to log into.

step.cmd: Click the OK button to finish the configuration of the connection.
